content: Is there a way to explicitely ask for type inference to find something that would otherwise be found by typeclass resolution? This was already a problem sometimes in Lean3, but I find Lean4 much more strict on that so it would be nice if we could temporarily turn it off.
Writing (_) for an argument will make TC skip it. Is that helpful?
It is, thanks! Sorry for the basic question :sweat_smile:
Anatole Dedecker has marked this topic as resolved.
Johan, do you know whether this is documented anywhere? This comes up from time to time on Zulip, but I don't know a reference.
Hopefully we can remove one or two versions among docs#Quotient.mk, docs#Quotient.mk', and docs#Quotient.mk'' ...
